A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Piss poor writing\, idiotic plot holes and needless asinine fluff to pad out the movie\, Star Wars\, the Last Jedi seems to have been constructed as a bunch of semi-cool scenes that needed to be tied around a story rather then a good story that is tied around decent scenes.    It's not worth your time\, and will suck the soul of the casual and intense star war fan all the same.
